welcome_benefits: 500 delight points on spending Rs 1500 or above in the first 30 days of issuance of the card and Â 300 delight points on the spending of Rs 1500 or above in 31 to 90 days of the issuance of the card.

Rewards Rate: 2 Delight points for every Rs 150 spent on shopping, dining, traveling
